CP437Extra - Class in net.pandoragames.charset
A modified version of code page 437 (DOS) to display "unprintable" characters: 0x00 (NULL) is rendered as Ø (Unicode 0x00D8). 0xFF (Non breaking space) is rendered as □ (Unicode 0x25a1).
